title: Day 1154
content:
# Day 1154

I'm going to go hard on this children's coloring book until it's a thing. I need to will this into existence.

So for the front cover I think this is nearing completion:

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*-I5Hco9zsmoRhtIS5rPEPQ.png)

I got a good start with all those pictures yesterday, but to make it even more educational I want to do one big word on the top then at the bottom I want to have a sentence. This way the book can be for a wider range of children.

## âœ… Final List of 21 Words with Captions

1. **Block**
 _"Blocks are how Bitcoin keeps track of time and transactions."_

2. **Chain**
 _"When blocks are linked together, they form the blockchain!"_

3. **Wallet**
 _"A wallet keeps your Bitcoin safe - just like a piggy bank keeps coins."_

4. **Key**
 _"Bitcoin private keys are like secret passwords that only you should know."_

5. **Mine**
 _"Miners help secure Bitcoin and earn coins by solving puzzles."_

6. **Hodl**
 _"HODL means holding your Bitcoin tight, even when prices bounce around."_

7. **Save**
 _"Saving helps you prepare for the future - Bitcoin makes saving strong!"_

8. **Secure**
 _"Bitcoin is secured by computers all over the world."_

9. **Node**
 _"A node helps check the rules and keeps Bitcoin honest."_

10. **Verify**
 _"Don't trust, verify yourself!"_

11. **Trade**
 _"Bitcoin lets you trade with anyone, anywhere, anytime."_

12. **Value**
 _"Bitcoin has value because it's limited and people believe in it."_

13. **Limited**
 _"Only 21 million Bitcoin will ever exist - that's what makes it rare!"_

14. **Treasure**
 _"Bitcoin is like treasure you can't dig up - but you can earn and save it."_

15. **Freedom**
 _"Bitcoin helps people stay free by giving them control of their money."_

16. **Energy**
 _"Bitcoin helps turn energy into money - even from trash, water, or sun!"_

17. **Code**
 _"Bitcoin runs on open code that anyone can check!"_

18. **Truth**
 _"Bitcoin is honest money. It can't lie, cheat, or play favorites."_

19. **Global**
 _"Bitcoin works all over the world, no matter where you are."_

20. **Moon** _(merged with Rocket)_
 _"People say Bitcoin is going to the moon - that means it's going up!"_

21. **Satoshi**
 _"Satoshi invented Bitcoin - but nobody knows who they are!"_
